casebody.data:
Bank of America, National Association, Appellee, v. Jimenez et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Bank of Am., Natl. Assn. v. Jimenez, 134 Ohio St.3d 360, 2012-Qhio-5499.]

(No. 2011-2104 Submitted December 4, 2012 Decided December 5, 2012.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings consistent with Fed. Home Loan Mtge. Corp. v. Schwartzwald, 134 Ohio St.3d 13, 2012-Ohio-5017, 979 N.E.2d 1214.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. *361Thompson Hiñe, L.L.P., Scott A. King, and Nicholas W. Myles, for appellee. Duncan Simonette, Inc., Brian K. Duncan, and Elliot B. Garvey, for appellants, Ezekiel Jimenez and Azar Sarikhani.
